custom_fields_by_lua.description: A list of key-value pairs, where the key is the name of a log field and the value is a chunk of Lua code, whose return value sets or replaces the log field value.

host.description: The IP address or host name to send data to.

keepalive.description: An optional value in milliseconds that defines how long an idle connection lives before being closed.

port.description: The port to send data to on the upstream server.

timeout.description: An optional timeout in milliseconds when sending data to the upstream server.

tls.description: Indicates whether to perform a TLS handshake against the remote server.

tls_sni.description: An optional string that defines the SNI (Server Name Indication) hostname to send in the TLS handshake.
